Welcome to my site

Hi! I'm Leo and welcome to my site. It's been built as that I can practice my coding and has used a combination of modern web development tools such as:

  • CMS: Netlify CMS
  • Hosting: Netlify
  • Version control: Git
  • Templating: Nunjucks
  • Runtime: Node
  • Compilation: Eleventy
